item.title: Need help with Delta 317. Where do I add the code?

item.description:
@Resent wrote:

The code should be put into client.java, I’m sure about that, but what I’m confused with is what are you trying to add in? Did you create a custom skill? Please provide some more information so I can provide you the proper answer.

item.title: Need help with Delta 317. Where do I add the code?
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

Well, I’m trying to add something to my delta source… It’s a little piece of code that’s supposed to happen when one of my variables, mathExp, is equal to another, nextMathExp. It should then send a message, as if you were leveling up in a skill, and also add 1 to the value of my variable mathLvl, and update so it’s all where it should be.

if (mathExp >= nextMathExp) {
mathLvl + 1;
sM(“Congratulations, you’ve just advanced a Mathematics level!”);
}

I tried putting it in the beginning of client.java, but idk… didn’t quite work:) Any help, please?

EDIT: I think I figured out where to put it, but, for some reason, the variable mathExp will get greater than nextMathExp, and won’t realize it’s the same/greater.:\

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Delta 317. Where do I add the code?
